Preference.app:summary:
Select the combat script in .txt format that will be used for Combat Mode. 

If none is selected, it will default to Full/Semi Auto. 

Combat Script Selected: none
Preference.app:title: Select Combat Script

Preference.app:summary: Select the Summon(s) in order from highest to lowest priority for Combat Mode.
Preference.app:title: Select Summon(s)*

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Automatically backs out of the Raid without retreating while under Semi/Full Auto after a certain period of time has passed for the purposes of farming more Raids.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Automatic Exiting Raids

SeekBarPreference.android:title: Set Time Allowed for Semi/Full Auto
SeekBarPreference.app:summary: Set the maximum minutes that the bot is allowed to be in Semi/Full Auto before moving on to the next Raid.

SwitchPreference.app:summary: Allows a static delay in seconds after each completed run.
SwitchPreference.app:title: Enable Singular Delay Between Runs

SwitchPreference.app:summary: Allows a randomized delay in seconds after each completed run using the provided lower and upper limits inclusive.
SwitchPreference.app:title: Enable randomized Delays Between Runs

SeekBarPreference.app:title: Set Upper Bound for Delay in Seconds

SeekBarPreference.android:summary: Sets the confidence level for matching an image to allow differing devices with differing screen sizes be more compatible. Default is 80%.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Set Confidence Level

SeekBarPreference.android:summary: Sets the confidence level for matching multiple images at once. Default is 80%. WARNING: Setting this too low will result in a infinite loop.
SeekBarPreference.app:title: Set Confidence Level for Multiple Matching

EditTextPreference.android:summary: Set the scale at which to resize existing image assets to match what would be shown on your device. Internally supported are 720p, 1080p, 1600p (Portrait) and 2560p (Landscape) in width.\n\nScale: 1.0 (Default)
EditTextPreference.android:title: Set Custom Scale

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Enable Discord notifications to inform you of status updates like loot drops.\n\nPlease be sure to update your config.yaml in your Internal Storage with the necessary Discord information for this to work.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Enable Discord notifications

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Enable skipping checks for AP/EP if you already enabled auto-restoring and enabled hiding the auto-restore notification in-game.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Enable Skipping AP/EP checks

CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Allows debugging messages in the log and test images to be created in the /temp/ folder.\n\nIncreases the average runtime of the bot due to constant IO operations.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Enable Debug Mode

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enables test for getting to the Home screen instead of the regular bot process. If the test fails, then it will run a different test to find which scale is appropriate for your device.\n\nUseful for troubleshooting working confidences and scales for device compatibility.
CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Enable Test for Home Screen
